com.nathanpaternoster.controllers.users

Class UserController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.nathanpaternoster.controllers.users.UserController
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    EmployeeController, ManagerController

    public class UserController
extends java.lang.Object
    Base class to handle user authentication and input validation

    • Method Detail

      • login

        public User login(int userID,
                  java.lang.String password)
        Authenticate the given user credentials
        Parameters:
        userID - The user's "employeeID" serving as their login username
        password - The user's password
        Returns:
        the user if login credentials are valid, null otherwise

      • validateName

        protected void validateName(java.lang.String firstName,
                            java.lang.String lastName)
                     throws java.lang.RuntimeException
        Check a user input representing a first and last name
        Parameters:
        firstName - The entered first name
        lastName - The entered last name
        Throws:
        java.lang.RuntimeException - if: - either name is not given - either name contains non-alphanumeric characters - either name has leading/trailing spaces or consecutive spaces

      • validatePassword

        protected void validatePassword(java.lang.String password)
                         throws java.lang.RuntimeException
        Check a user input representing a password
        Parameters:
        password - The entered password
        Throws:
        java.lang.RuntimeException - if: - the password is not at least MIN_PASSWORD_LENGTH characters long - the password does not include at least 1 letter - the password does not include at least 1 number

      • validateEmail

        protected void validateEmail(java.lang.String email)
                      throws java.lang.RuntimeException
        Check a user input representing an email
        Parameters:
        email - The entered email
        Throws:
        java.lang.RuntimeException - if the email address is already registered in the database

      • validateDOB

        protected void validateDOB(java.time.LocalDate dob)
                    throws java.lang.RuntimeException
        Check a user input representing a date of birth
        Parameters:
        dob - The entered date of birth (null values are allowed)
        Throws:
        java.lang.RuntimeException - if the date of birth is in the future
